000010 00000 00001 0111111111111111     # addi $r0 $r1
001100 00001 00010 0000000000000000     # andi $r1 $r2
111111 00010 000000000000000000000     # asrt $r2

001100 00001 00011 0101010101010101     # andi $r1 $r3
111111 00011  000000101010101010101     # asrt $r3

000010 00000 00100 0000111100110101     # addi $r0 $r4
001100 00100 00101 0101010101010101     # andi $r4 $r5
111111 00101  000000000010100010101     # asrt $r5

111100 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000   # halt
